org.swerverobotics.library.internal

Class LegacyOrModernColorSensor

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.swerverobotics.library.internal.LegacyOrModernColorSensor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.qualcomm.robotcore.hardware.ColorSensor, com.qualcomm.robotcore.hardware.HardwareDevice, IOpModeStateTransitionEvents

    public class LegacyOrModernColorSensor
extends java.lang.Object
implements com.qualcomm.robotcore.hardware.ColorSensor, IOpModeStateTransitionEvents
    This class implements a driver for either a HiTechnic color sensor or a Modern Robotics color sensor. The two are very similar I2C devices; it's easy for them to share code.

      • onUserOpModeStop

        public boolean onUserOpModeStop()
        Description copied from interface: IOpModeStateTransitionEvents
        A user OpMode has just stopped. Robot motion should cease.
        Specified by:
        onUserOpModeStop in interface IOpModeStateTransitionEvents
        Returns:
        if true, the receiver will not receive *any* more opmode state transitions

      • onRobotShutdown

        public boolean onRobotShutdown()
        Description copied from interface: IOpModeStateTransitionEvents
        The robot is in the process of shutting down. All hardware devices, for example, should close().
        Specified by:
        onRobotShutdown in interface IOpModeStateTransitionEvents
        Returns:
        if true, the receiver will not receive *any* more opmode state transitions
        See Also:
        HardwareDevice.close()
